summary: vanessa santillan 's body was found in a # 400,000 flat in fulham , south west london , at the end of march . the 33-year-old mexican national , who worked as a transgender escort , died as a result of injuries to the head and neck . her body was found in a flat in fulham having been strangled and beaten to death .

aspect: 1. A man has been arrested in connection with the death of a transgender escort who was found strangled and beaten last month in a £400,000 flat in Fulham, south west London.
2. Vanessa Santillan's body was found in a flat in Fulham having been strangled and beaten to death, and a 23-year-old man was arrested in connection with her death but has been bailed.

3. Police are appealing to anyone who may have had contact with Miss Santillan in the hours before her death, and Miss Santillan spoke of her love for London and Paris online in the weeks before her death.
